name: Ender's Game Multiple Choice Quiz | Authors

questions.text: What is Ender Wiggin's brother's name?
questions.explanation:
Peter.

	Peter is Ender's wicked brother who likes to torture animals, and he likes to kill things.

Valentine.

	Valentine is always sticking up for Ender when Peter is being cruel to him.

questions.text: Who took Ender to battle school?
questions.explanation:
Colonel Graff.

	Colonel Graff is the one who recruited Ender when he was six years old.

Dragon Army.

	Ender gets to lead his own army. Dragon Army was created mainly for Ender himself!

questions.text: True or False. Ender is a third born.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Ender is a third born which parents aren't allowed to have three children.
